extendedInfo.description: Pet Cafe invites you to be the master restaurant owner in this 3D animated cafe!Run your restaurant from its infancy to becoming the hit of the town! This will be one of the few restaurants in the virtual world that welcomes pets, as patrons bring along their favorite pals to dine at your restaurant!Running a pet restaurant can be tough, but you have Cuby and his pals to keep things rolling and keep the money flowing!  As news of your restaurant spreads, watch out for famous Star VIP customers and their pets - these big spenders might drop by for at your restaurant for a quick meal at any moment! Using your hard-earned money, expand your cafe to accommodate more customers and redesign your restaurant with a wide selection of furniture and decorations to give it your own personal touch!Figure out the subtle strategy behind running a successful restaurant, and your humble cafe will be a booming business in no time! There's no time to rest - this restaurant business runs 24/7! Good luck!â Strategize on how to serve all the flowing customers into your restaurant while keeping them well fed!â Expand and personalize your very own 3D restaurant!â Unexpected but well known VIPs will visit your restaurant!â Stunning 3D animation that takes you into the world of the restaurant business!Pet Cafe is by Animoca, a leading Android Mobile Social Game Developer. It's hit titles include Star Girl, Pretty Pet Salon, Pretty Pet Salon Season, Pretty Pet Tycoon, My Pet Cuby, Pretty Pet Toy Store, Pet Cafe, My Car Salon, Robo 5, Cinderella Cafe, Aqua City, Top Models, Stellar Escape, Forest Defense, Cover Beauty, Bulba the Cat, Diner City and many other cute and fun games and applications.

reviews.title: Love it!!!!!
reviews.comment: This game is sooooo cute!!! And more realistic as far as running an actual cafe. Just love the gameplay and characters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid!
reviews.comment: Third time reinstalling this game!  Now its stuck on load screen and my food keeps going bad! Can only get on every few days I am finally uninstalling game for good!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It was good
reviews.comment: I had this game before the quest updates and it worked great, but now it won\'t load if i\'m connected to wifi or 3G. It constantly crashes when I try to get free pet points. The rare times I do get pet points half of them aren\'t even awarded! It\'s a fun game but these problems are awful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: *Cute Game*
reviews.comment: This game is Crackalackin:-)  I love it. What an awesome and adorable game this is. I give it 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aceone
reviews.comment: Things are too expensive and people without credit card is harder to gain pet points   Loading screen sticks  Other than that its very fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bugs here, bugs everywhere
reviews.comment: Bugs that needs to be fixed. 1. Sometimes the waiters will be stuck holding the food.  2. Sometimes the game restarts.  My suggestion.  You can add friends by using facebook.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s okay but....
reviews.comment: I had expanded my resturant. Then after I did the game force closed on me. When I finally got it to work my expansion wasn\'t there and it didn\'t replace the coins I bought the expansion with. Second thing, I did another expansion and it forced closed. When I got the game to work Again my waiters were not there( \"unfired\") I had Cuby at max level and Speedy to where I needed 30,000 coins to train. Please fix this problem! Then I will rate better.
reviews.author: Lauren Van Inwegen

reviews.title: Used to be fun
reviews.comment: I was addicted to this game until the most recent version release. Now the game will not consistently load on my Droid X. Doesn\'t matter if I have a strong wifi or 3G connection, the game will not load 9 out of 10 times. The last straw was when the game FINALLY loaded and all seven of my characters were deleted. Very frustrating especially after getting to level 48 and over 5 million coins. Game will be uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sometimes
reviews.comment: Please fix , Sometimes when im going to play .. the loading is just toooooooooooo much annoying , it takes several minute but still, not working ..
reviews.author: Adrian Villanueva

reviews.title: Read all about it
reviews.comment: I cam think you should update pet cafe because it is almost impossible to get it to work on my phone please help at once!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezing and bug issues
reviews.comment: I f*uckin luv the game. I have a galaxy tab. Two weeks later, If only you could fix the freezing issues I will give a five star. A LOT OF TIMES the Waiters do not work. Pets will be stuck holding the food. It\'s frustrating me! My friend has the same issue on her Galaxy note.
reviews.author: Dj Asuncion

reviews.title: Unhappy Gamer
reviews.comment: I just re-downloaded this game. (want to try it again) now it open :-(  Get error conntecting to net...im connected :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worst game ever! I lost all my staff. I payed real money for that!!! And now they randomly got fired!?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RIP OFF
reviews.comment: i want to buy 200 coins never got it, support never got back to me !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this game but everything cost to much money! An energy drink costs 2,000 coins. It also is a bit cheesy.\tUninstalling!
reviews.author: Natalie Oliver

reviews.title: Lost everything!!!
reviews.comment: Lost all my waiters, my pet points, my money, my level restarted to the beginning, but I still have my cafe equipment, and my food doesn\'t go bad, but I have to prepare and serve it multiple times for the same foods... Seriously wanting to uninstall!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would like this game much better if it didn\'t have some many giltches. For example, the special event doesn\'t work when tapping on it. Etc. When these bugs are fixed I download it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: I don\'t like how you have to be on certain levels to cook certain food. I also don\'t like how the custormus just walk off angrily so I\'m giving it a 2 star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Well, it takes a long time for the customers to go to the cash register. Other then that it\'s cool and fun for me.
reviews.author: Lily Moocow

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: The animals are so cute!!!! It works perfectly!!!! This is an awesome game. Nice work!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
